name: 4-Ingredient Gluten-Free Dough Flatbread 🥗
description: This flatbread is made with only four ingredients and is gluten-free. It's perfect for serving as a base for your favorite toppings, such as hummus, veggies, or cheese.
instructions: In a large bowl, mix together the yogurt, gluten-free flour blend, baking powder, and salt until a dough forms.
Transfer the dough to a lightly-floured surface and flatten into an 8-inch (20 cm) disk.
Cut the disk into 4 equal parts and flatten each part to about ¼ inch (6 mm) thick.
Very carefully transfer the dough pieces to a nonstick pan preheated over medium heat.
Cook each side of the flatbread until well browned.
